trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dixon
There were no other sightings in Dixon on or around March 1st 2012
Summary: Went outside to smoke as soon as i opend door a bright white light shot across the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going outside to smoke a cigarette, as soon as I opend the front door a bright white light shot straight across the sky at speeds that were mind boggling to me at first I thought it may have been a shooting star but then I realized that it wasnt considering it didnt have any sort of tail and it was traveling in a straight path before disapeering behind the trees and a house.
